DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether copeptin level increase upon psychological stress ( i.e . write examination ) whether copeptin level measure immediately write examination predict success examination .
DOC.brief_title: Copeptin Stress Marker During Written Examination
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year Member 4th year medical course Basel University Intake medication ( except birth control pill ) BMI 30kg/m2 Evidence acute disease History chronic illness , include chronic psychiatric disease Anamnestic certain assume pregnancy Regularly smoking student
